title: No, Biden Didn’t Say ‘You Can’t Legislate by Executive Order Unless You’re a Dictator’
subtitle: Conservatives criticized the president's flurry of executive orders made in the first weeks of his term.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: When he was still a candidate for the presidency in October 2020, U.S. President Joe Biden said, “You can’t legislate by executive order unless you’re a dictator.”
